oai_dc:dc.dc:title: We Just Can't Shop on an Empty Stomach.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Young African American woman holding a protest sign around her neck which reads "We just can't shop on an empty stomach."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African Americans
Women; Signs (Notices); Civil rights demonstrations; Photographers
